entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then clear. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:21 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:21 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
